title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.3 - Staff coordination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 702.3 - Staff coordination

State Regulations

The superintendent shall designate a staff member to be
responsible for coordinating grievance activities within the facility, recording and processing grievances through each step, and reporting monthly
grievance activity to the Director, Inmate Grievance Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
702.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
